QuestData.Title: Expedition Supply Kit
QuestData.Description:
Explorer, your discoveries have been invaluable.
There is even more out there to uncover and we have the tools to help you do it.
Come back to the Dragonscale Basecamp and gear up using the Expedition Supply Kit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the new tools available in the Expedition Supply Kit at the Dragonscale Basecamp.
